title: 87/202/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 March 1987 approving the third amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Greece (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 6 March 1987
approving the third amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Greece
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(87/202/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The third amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Greece, is hereby approved.
The amendment of the plan referred to in Article 1 shall take effect on 1 January 1987.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
